description: Try our easy to follow Sushi Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sushi Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make tuna and corn sushi, spread cream cheese over the remaining slices of flattened bread to the edges. Mix tuna and corn in a bowl to combine well. Spread tuna mixture to cover half of each slice opposite to crust. Place 2 Qukes baby cucumber strips along the crust. Roll as tightly as possible. Press to seal and cut into bite sized pieces. Serve.

To make tuna and corn sushi, spread cream cheese over the remaining slices of flattened bread to the edges. Mix tuna and corn in a bowl to combine well. Spread tuna mixture to cover half of each slice opposite to crust. Place 2 Qukes baby cucumber strips along the crust. Roll as tightly as possible. Press to seal and cut into bite sized pieces. Serve.

To make tuna and corn sushi, spread cream cheese over the remaining slices of flattened bread to the edges. Mix tuna and corn in a bowl to combine well. Spread tuna mixture to cover half of each slice opposite to crust. Place 2 Qukes baby cucumber strips along the crust. Roll as tightly as possible. Press to seal and cut into bite sized pieces. Serve.
